localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: The S&P 500's P/E ratio has moved from 20.6 at the start of 2020 to 30.3 today, on pace for the highest year-end multiple on record (using TTM earnings). $SPX https://t.co/Pxqg1r3aWJ
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 标准普尔500指数的市盈率已从2020年初的20.6倍升至目前的30.3倍，有望创下有记录以来最高的年终市盈率(以TTM盈利计算)。$spx https://t.co/Pxqg1r3aWJ
標準普爾500指數的市盈率已從2020年初的20.6倍升至目前的30.3倍，有望創下有記錄以來最高的年終市盈率(以TTM盈利計算)。$spx https://t.co/Pxqg1r3aWJ

localize.quoted_status_full_text: 运送数百万剂第一种冠状病毒疫苗的卡车已经离开辉瑞的场地，这是在全国范围内分发疫苗的第一步。@WOODTV https://t.co/lC0GoFin6S

localize.quoted_status_full_text: 運送數百萬劑第一種冠狀病毒疫苗的卡車已經離開輝瑞的場地，這是在全國範圍內分發疫苗的第一步。@WOODTV https://t.co/lC0GoFin6S
